features: For bleached blonde to light brown hair
Colour cream only to achieve an intense colour
Add conditioner to create a pastel shade or your own new colour
description: Product Description LIVE Ultra Brights Or Pastel Shocking Pink 093 is a semi-permanent hair dye designed for bleached blonde to light brown hair. Use the colour cream to achieve an intense colour or add the conditioner for a pastel shade or creating your own new colour, lasting up to 15 washes. - Semi-permanent hair dye - For bleached blonde to light brown hair - Colour cream only to achieve an intense colour - Add conditioner to create a pastel shade or your own new colour - Lasts up to 15 washes LIVE top tips: - For long or thick hair we recommended using two packs - Go pastel by mixing Colour Cream with Conditioner included - This shade is recommended for hair colours bleached blonde to light brown - Dark hair. Pre-lighten with LIVE Intense Lightener for a soft pastel result - Results may vary on previously coloured hair - Use a clarifying or deep cleanse shampoo directly before application Pack contains: 1 tube Pretty Pastels Colour Cream 50ml 2 sachets of Care Conditioner 15ml 1 pair of gloves 1 instruction leaflet For further information and free hair colour advice please call the Schwarzkopf advisory service on freephone: UK 0800 328 9214, consumer.advisory@henkel.com. Find us online: Instagram: @livecolourhair Facebook: schwarzkopflivecolour. Ingredients Colour cream: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Coconut Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum, Polyquaternium-6, Etidronic Acid, Methylparaben, Basic Violet 2, Ethanolamine, Sodium Chloride, Conditioner: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Quaternium-87, Propylene Glycol, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Hydrolyzed Keratin, Panthenol, Isopropyl Myristate, Citric Acid, Distearoylethyl Hydroxyethylmonium Methosulfate, Sodium Benzoate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Ceteareth-20, Glyceryl Stearate, Parfum, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Limonene Directions Apply to pre-lightened or blonde hair for best results. The color will gradually fade after a few washes. Box Contains 1 x Tube LIVE Ultra Brights Colour Crème (50ml) 2 x Sachets Conditioner (2x15ml) 1 x Pair of Gloves 1 x Instruction Leaflet Manufacturer Contact Information Oxford Hse Oxford Rd Aylesbury Bucks Hp21 8Sz See more
